text: Philipp Schmid mcp-cli update! "Faster MCP interactions with smart connection and granular tool control. - 3-subcommand architecture to remove side effect: `info`, `grep`, and `call` - Connection pooling daemon with 60-second idle timeout. - Filter tools per server via allowedTools/disabledTools globs. - Improved errors messages for better LLM recovery - New Improved Agent skill ``` curl -fsSL <https://raw>(.)githubusercontent(.)com/philschmid/mcp-cli/main/install.sh | bash ```"
